translations: v．轻击（棒球）：在棒球比赛中，击球手故意用球棒轻轻触球，使球沿地面滚动，而不是击出远距离。
· The batter bunted the ball down the third base line.
击球手将球轻轻地沿着三垒线滚动。

sentences.sentence: Rich Becker bunted a ball on the third-base side of the mound.
sentences.translation: 里奇.贝克尔把球打到了三垒旁的投球区土墩。

sentences.sentence: He bunted at the first pitch.
